product_name: Patagonia Micro D Fleece Bottoms - Boys' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The plush, quick-drying Patagonia Micro D fleece bottoms for boys add warmth to cool-weather adventures. Wear them as an insulating midlayer or as an outer layer. Partially recycled midweight polyester fleece dries fast, breathes well and insulates even when wet. Flatseam construction prevents chafing. Self-fabric elasticized waistband is comfortable against skin. Patagonia Micro D bottoms have slightly relaxed leg openings for easy layering and a motion-friendly fit. Closeout.
